ROBERT F. SCHENKKAN
DIRECTOR
January 30, 1964
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Gentlemen:
I am enclosing two motion picture cost estimates to cover the production
of the NAEB Utilization Kit Films -- one of these to cover the cost of
producing the six films in 16mm color, and one for 16mm black and
white.
You will observe that the cost estimate for black and white is $57, 500. 00
. . . the series in color, $60, 000. 00, only $2, 500. 00 more.
Assuming that we could start on the shooting scripts and production
without any further delay, we anticipate that the film project could be
completed by the end of the year.
We will assume full responsibility for securing written releases for all
talent, music, visuals, and example program footage.
We feel that this is an exciting and much-needed project, one which has
been given a great deal of thought and care; and we would like to have a
part in bringing it to completion.
Sincerely^
EJM:db
Enclosures (2)
